name: Neon Rush (Pavee)
description:
You're playing as a small cube in a 2D neon themed world. Your goal - getting to the finish as soon as you can. Sounds easy right? Wrong!  Because there are invisible blocks and some fake ones. The levels are revealing themselves as you play more.  Compete with your friends for the best time. It's an easy to play game with as little as 4 controls.

Controls:

W / arrow up / space  -> Jump 
S / arrow down / shift -> Dash down
A / arrow left -> Left
D / arrow right -> Right
